dbi.sqlite.SqliteDatabase

Authors:
The D DBI project

class SqliteDatabase: dbi.BaseDatabase.BaseDatabase;
Manage a SQLite database. This class implements all of the current DBD interface as defined in Database. In addition, a few "extra" functions are included.

See Also:
BaseDatabase, Database

this();


this(char[] dbFile);


void connect(char[] dbFile, char[] user = null, char[] passwd = null);
Connect to a database or create one if necessary.

Params:

void close();


void execute(char[] sql);


Result query(char[] sql);


deprecated int getErrorCode();


deprecated char[] getErrorMessage();


long getLastInsertRowId();


int getChanges();


char[][] getTableNames();
Get a list of all table names.

Returns:
Array of all table names.

char[][] getViewNames();
Get a list of all view names.

Returns:
Array of all view names.

char[][] getIndexNames();
Get a list of all index names.

Returns:
Array of all index names.

bool hasTable(char[] name);
Does this database have the given table?

Param:
name = Name of the table to check for the existance of.

Returns:
false if it doesn't have it and true otherwise.

bool hasView(char[] name);
Does this database have the given view?

Params:
char[] name Name of the view to check for the existance of.

Returns:
false if it doesn't have it and true otherwise.

bool hasIndex(char[] name);
Does this database have the given index?

Params:
char[] name Name of the index to check for the existance of.

Returns:
false if it doesn't have it and true otherwise.
